metadata.synopsis: When they see the avatar arrives to the party (they see the avatar), they call out to them.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: There you are! Keeping us all on tenterhooks so you could make a dramatic entrance, is it?
0.context: NodeContext: Greeting the player, who has just arrived at the epilogue party. Here, she turned from Shar and has a platonic relationship.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: You made it. Lady Shar smiles on us.
1.context: NodeContext: Greeting the player, who has just arrived at the epilogue party. Here, Shadowheart stayed loyal to Shar. She could be purely platonic with the player, or engaged in a sort of casual long-distance relationship that she plays prertty cool
